name: dwi-flip-bvec
label: SCITRAN: DWI Flip Bvec
description: Flip the sign of the bvec vector in the specified vector(s).
author: GLU <glerma@stanford.edu>

xFlip.description: Flip the x axis of the bvec (true/false, default=false)

yFlip.description: Flip the y axis of the bvec (true/false, default=false)

zFlip.description: Flip the z axis of the bvec (true/false, default=false)
